description: Bado brought his big cock along with him to his job interview. Upon entering into the office alone with the boss, he felt an instant kind of attraction. Bado had always been Bi-curious, but just at this moment, he felt 100% into the man opposite him. Of course, Bado had to find out, so he went for it. These two guys held nothing back in this wild gay romp, and you won't want to miss it.
title: Private Sector
